member.name: T:MathematicsModularFramework.Serialization.IDataSerializer
member.summary: Defines methods for serializing and deserializing objects.

member.name: M:MathematicsModularFramework.Serialization.IDataSerializer.DataTypeIsSupported(System.Type)
member.summary: Checks whether serialization is supported for the specified data type.
member.returns: Whether serialization is supported for the specified data type.

member.name: M:MathematicsModularFramework.Serialization.IDataSerializer.SerializeDataValue(System.Type,System.Object,System.IO.StreamWriter)
member.summary: Serializes the specified object to the specified stream writer.
member.param: The data type that the object should be serialized as.
The stream writer to serialize to.

member.name: M:MathematicsModularFramework.Serialization.IDataSerializer.DeserializeDataValue(System.Type,System.IO.StreamReader)
member.summary: Deserializes the specified object from the specified stream reader.
member.param: The data type of the object.
The stream writer to deserialize from.

member.name: T:MathematicsModularFramework.Serialization.IXmlDataSerializer
member.summary: Defines methods for serializing and deserializing objects to and from an XML document.

member.name: M:MathematicsModularFramework.Serialization.IXmlDataSerializer.SerializeData(System.Type,System.Object,System.Xml.XmlWriter)
member.summary: Serializes the specified object to the specified XML writer.
member.param: The data type that the object should be serialized as.
The XML writer to serialize to.

member.name: M:MathematicsModularFramework.Serialization.IXmlDataSerializer.DeserializeDataValue(System.Type,System.Xml.XmlReader)
member.summary: Deserializes the specified object from the specified XML reader.
member.param: The data type of the object.
The XML writer to deserialize from.

member.name: T:MathematicsModularFramework.Serialization.IModuleGraphSerializer
member.summary: Defines methods for serializing and deserializing module graphs.

member.name: M:MathematicsModularFramework.Serialization.IModuleGraphSerializer.Serialize(MathematicsModularFramework.ModuleGraph)
member.summary: Serializes the specified module graph to a string.

member.name: M:MathematicsModularFramework.Serialization.IModuleGraphSerializer.Serialize(MathematicsModularFramework.ModuleGraph,System.IO.StreamWriter)
member.summary: Serializes the specified module graph to the specified stream writer.
member.param: The stream writer to serialize to.

member.name: M:MathematicsModularFramework.Serialization.IModuleGraphSerializer.Deserialize(System.String)
member.summary: Deserializes a module graph from the specified string.
member.param: The serialized module graph to deserialize.

member.name: M:MathematicsModularFramework.Serialization.IModuleGraphSerializer.Deserialize(System.IO.StreamReader)
member.summary: Deserializes a module graph from the specified stream reader.
member.param: The stream reader containing the serialized module graph.
